revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Account of Phoibammon son of Hermias, scribe; on account of the 'name' of Eulogios k. 1 1/8 and for keph(al )800 (myriads) of (denarii); on account of the 'name' Martyrios k. 1 and on account of the 'name' of Phoibammon son of Pettirios k. 1, in total -- <k.> 3 1/8, for expenses (?) 325 -- , in total 2580 myr.den. and for keph(al ) 800 myr.den.; and Phoibammon son of Onnophris (has paid?) 385 myr.den.; and for the price of 2 dipla (has paid) Arion son of Jacob 300 myr.den. and for transportation charges 300 myr.den., together in total 4265 myriads. Of these through Maria, daughter of Asklas, 1875 myr.den. Remainder in total 2400 myr.den. and 5.5 artabs of wheat....

listBibl.bibl: Worp, K. A. - Nielsen, B. "New Papyri from the New York University Collection: III". ZPE 140 (2002) 141-3 (Nr. 31)
